name: Survivor: The Interactive Game - The Australian Outback Edition
name_original: Survivor: The Interactive Game - The Australian Outback Edition
description:
Survivor: The Interactive Game - The Australian Outback Edition is an arcade-puzzle game developed by Magic Lantern Playware. It came out on 01-01-2001. Infogrames published the game.
You can play Survivor: The Interactive Game - The Australian Outback Edition on PC.
